description:
___
###[choco://readycloud](choco://readycloud)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)
___

![Screenshot of NETGEAR ReadyCLOUD](http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/answer_media/images/readycloud/downloadlink5.png)

##ReadyCLOUD

###Easily add a personal cloud to your home network

ReadyCLOUD is a free service that allows you to access files on your ReadyNAS or on storage connected to your Nighthawk anytime, anywhere, or from any web-enabled device.

###Which solution is right for you?	Router*	ReadyNAS

No monthly fees - Router ✔ ReadyNAS ✔

Anywhere access to your files - Router ✔ ReadyNAS ✔

Additional storage for your devices - Router ✔ ReadyNAS ✔

Easy file sharing - Router ✔ ReadyNAS ✔

Automatic Backup & Sync - Router X ReadyNAS ✔

5 levels of file protection - Router X ReadyNAS ✔

Movie & music streaming - Router X ReadyNAS ✔

*Requires an attached USB storage device

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/readycloud/readme.md)**


___

Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.
___
summary: ReadyCLOUD gives you remote access over the Internet to a USB storage device that is connected to your router's USB port.
author: NETGEAR,  Inc.
